(Medium)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-validator-interface/src/rest_interface.rs] [Function: get_or_update_package_registry()] [Cache staleness] Is there any mechanism to invalidate package_registry_cache entries when packages are upgraded, or can stale package registries be served from cache indefinitely? (High)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-validator-interface/src/rest_interface.rs] [Function: retrieve_available_src()] [Data map vs cache inconsistency] Can the local 'data' HashMap and the shared 'package_cache' become inconsistent if errors occur during retrieval, causing some packages to be in one but not the other? (Medium)

[File: aptos-move/aptos-validator-interface/src/rest_interface.rs] [Function: get_and_filter_committed_transactions()] [Status check completeness] Does checking 'txn_info.status().is_success()' and 'MiscellaneousError' cover all failure cases, or are there other ExecutionStatus variants that should be filtered but aren't? [File: aptos-move/aptos-validator-interface/src/rest_interface.rs] [Function: get_committed_transactions()] [BCS version compatibility] Does the function assume a specific BCS encoding version, and can changes to BCS format in future Aptos upgrades break the deserialization of transactions? [File: aptos-move/aptos-validator-interface/src/rest_interface.rs] [Function: All async functions] [Timeout handling] Do any of the async REST API calls have timeout mechanisms, or can they hang indefinitely waiting for responses from unresponsive servers? (High)
